name: Pratyush Mishra
content: Pratyush Mishra Skip to main content Link Menu Expand (external link) Copy Copied Pratyush Mishra Assistant Professor Department of Computer and Information Science University of Pennsylvania Email: prat@seas.upenn.edu Office: Amy Gutmann Hall, Room 323 About meHi! I’m Pratyush. I am an Assistant Professor of Computer and Information Science at the University of Pennsylvania, where I am a member of the Security and Privacy Laboratory.My research lies at the intersection of cryptography and computer security, with a focus on efficient realizations and applications of cryptographic proof systems and secure computation.I am a co-author and co-maintainer of the arkworks ecosystem, which is a collection of libraries for zkSNARKs.I am a founding scientist at Aleo, a startup based on my research project Zexe (see below). Previously, I completed my PhD in Computer Science at UC Berkeley under the excellent supervision of Alessandro Chiesa and Raluca Ada Popa. Before that, I completed my BSc in EECS at UC Berkeley, where I did research under the guidance of David Wagner.
